page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT IN GLASSARY
page.content: MUCH OF THE ENTERTAINMENT THAT PEOPLE ENJOY IS TO BE FOUND IN WATCHING TELEVISION PROGRAMMES. ANY OTHER ENTERTAINMENT HAS TO BE SELF MADE AS THERE ARE NO CINEMAS OR THEATRES IN THE AREA. THERE ARE DRAMATIC SOCIETIES, CHOIRS AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS WHICH PRODUCE PLAYS AND CONCERTS FROM TIME TO TIME BUT THESE ARE MAINLY BASES AT LOCHGILPHEAD. THERE ARE, OF COURSE, PEOPLE FROM THE VILLAGE WHO BELONG TO THESE ORGANISATIONS AND MOST OF THE VILLAGERS SUPPORT ANY PRODUCTIONS OR PERFORMANCES. GLASSARY SCHOOL PRODUCES A PLAY, MUSICAL OR A NATIVITY PLAY EACH YEAR AT CHRISTMAS. THIS IS USUALLY PERFORMED IN THE{LACHLAN MILLER HALL TO A CAPACITY AUDIENCE.
